short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters spam from the DougDoug Twitch chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon filters spam primarily from the DougDoug Live Twitch chat and the VODs.

Key Features

 Removes:

- single character words
- doug specific strings like "rigged", "doug", "morb" etc.
- number-only messages
- @mentions
- donation/resub messages
- spamming of a single word over and over


Don't forget to reload page after changing the settings!
